channel.title: none on April - APL embedded in Common Lisp
channel.description: Recent content in none on April - APL embedded in Common Lisp

item.title: noffi
Dyalog Vision
item.description: Dyalog Vision I have been looking at the APL family tree of languages Among them I found Dyalog APL Vision Image processing is a field of interest to me. It can be done on the GPU and it fits into the idea of doing all the computations on the GPU aka NVIDIA Rapids. So I decided to make a quick note of it.

item.title: github repository online
item.description: Now posted on april-gpu. For the moment doesn’t do anything just basic build structure. Will load the necessary lisp libraries if you try to build it
